'''15w51b''' is the forty-eighth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.9]], released on December 17, 2015<ref>{{link|url=https://www.mojang.com/2015/12/minecraft-snapshot-15w51a/|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160202011231/http://mojang.com/2015/12/minecraft-snapshot-15w51a/|title=Minecraft snapshot 15w51b|author=Searge|website=Mojang.com|date=Dec 17, 2015}}</ref>, which fixes two bugs and a crash in the AI and pathfinding code. This is the final snapshot released in 2015.

== Changes ==
=== Mobs ===
[[File:Silverfish JE1 BE1.gif|width=51x51]] '''[[Silverfish]]'''
* No longer enter into blocks if the [[game rule]] <code>mobGriefing</code> is false.

=== Command format ===
'''[[NBT format]]'''
* Entity: ArmorStand
** <code>DisabledSlots</code> (integer): Original values have changed in nature.
*** 1 << slot = disables all interaction.
*** 1 << (slot + 8) = disables removing.
*** 1 << (slot + 16) = disables placing.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=15w51b|prefix=Minecraft
|;old
|80586|Silverfish go into blocks when <code>mobGriefing</code> set to false.
|83964|Blindness and night vision don't create complete blindness anymore.
|;previous
|94419|Server Crash - <code>NullPointer: Ticking entity</code>.
}}</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* 15w51b was previously removed from the [[launcher]] for some time, but was added back in September 2018.
* As with [[15w51a]], 15w51b was released on the second latest calendar date out of all snapshots on December 17, only beaten by [[23w51a]] and [[23w51b]] on December 18.
